name: Drink It, Draw It
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 2 DAYS! BUGS MIGHT OCCUR!

CONTROLS:
Click the computer to order soup (takes 5 seconds to arrive)
Click the canvas to paint your soup can
Click the soup button to drink soup to get energy
Don't get to 0 energy and don't let the time run out!

"It's short, yet super sweet." - Roblox Inc. (April, 1855)
"Good-time brain-teasing  fun!" - Nintendo Power (September, 2003)
"Great game, but my parents are fighting." - FOX Gaming (June, 2011)

You play as Campy, a little... I don't really know what he is... who's working towards becoming a famous painter. He had completely forgotten the art assignment he had gotten, so he's now in a rush to create his biggest masterpiece yet: a soup can! But, as they all say: "What's the point of a can when the inside doesn't have a taste?"

This game was made for Paint Jam 2021!

THIS GAME IS OPEN-SOURCE AT https://github.com/hdboye/PaintJam2021
Its meant to be challenging by the way :)
